name: 李紹先
objective:
本課程內容含有: (1) 簡介。(2) 光電能源物理 (3) 太陽能電池材料與原理 (4) 光電化學能源技術 (5) 儲能材料與元件 (6) 先進能源材料分析技術 (optional)
The class includes :1.Course Introduction, 2.solar energy,3. solar cell materials and devices 4. photo-electrochemical reactions for energy harvesting,5. energy storage technology, 6. advanced characterization tools for energy material research
schedule:
1. introduction
2. fundamental physics of energy materials
3. photovoltaic materials
4. nano materials and nano science for energy application
5. fundamental of electrochemistry for energy application 
6. mid term exam. 
7. artificial photosynthesis (solar to fuel)
8. energy storage (batteries)
9. hydrogen energy: hydrogen generation and storage
10.advanced characterization tools for energy material research 
11. final report
scorePolicy:
report 40%
